name: Starfire Ruby
description: A radiant ruby that seems to burn with an inner flame, coveted by royalty.

name: Ethereal Sapphire
description: A sapphire of deep blue hues that shimmers as though holding the night sky.

name: Verdant Emerald
description: A flawless emerald with a lush green color reminiscent of ancient forests.

name: Moonstone of Tranquility
description: A pearly stone that glows faintly under moonlight, said to bring peace.

name: Shadow Obsidian
description: A glossy black stone that seems to absorb surrounding light, enigmatic and rare.

name: Golden Topaz
description: A golden-yellow gem that sparkles like the sun, symbolizing wealth and power.

name: Celestial Opal
description: An opal with shifting colors resembling a celestial aurora, mesmerizing to behold.

name: Crimson Garnet
description: A blood-red garnet prized by warriors for its bold and fiery hue.

name: Azure Aquamarine
description: A crystal-clear stone of serene blue, reminiscent of tranquil ocean waves.

name: Twilight Amethyst
description: A deep purple amethyst that seems to hold the essence of dusk.
